
``removeGiottoEnvironment``
===============================

removeGiottoEnvironment

Description
-----------

removeGiottoEnvironment

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   removeGiottoEnvironment(verbose = TRUE)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``verbose``
     - be verbose


Details
-------

Removes a previously installed giotto environment.
 See `\ ``installGiottoEnvironment`` <#installgiottoenvironment>`_ .
